name: Austrian Airlines AG
description: Austrian Airlines AG is the flag carrier airline of Austria and a prominent member of the Lufthansa Group. Established in 1957, the airline has its hub at Vienna International Airport, which connects Europe to various destinations across the globe. Austrian Airlines operates a comprehensive network of domestic and international flights, serving over 130 destinations in 55 countries. The airline is renowned for its commitment to quality service, offering passengers an exceptional travel experience from check-in to arrival. Austrian Airlines is well known for its distinctive red and white branding and its traditional in-flight services, which reflect the rich cultural heritage of Austria. The airline operates a modern fleet of aircraft, including the Boeing 777 and the Airbus A320 family, ensuring safety, comfort, and efficiency. Furthermore, Austrian Airlines emphasizes sustainability and is actively working to reduce its carbon footprint through various initiatives, including fleet modernization and the adoption of more efficient operational practices. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction, Austrian Airlines continues to enhance its services, including premium offerings in business and economy classes, making it a preferred choice for travelers looking for quality air travel.

seo.meta_title: Austrian Airlines AG | Quality Air Travel from Austria
seo.meta_description: Experience exceptional air travel with Austrian Airlines AG, the flag carrier of Austria, offering a wide range of domestic and international flights with a focus on quality service.

faq.question: What destinations does Austrian Airlines serve?
faq.answer: Austrian Airlines serves over 130 destinations across Europe and the world.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Austrian Airlines?
faq.answer: Anna B. H. Wüst is the CEO of Austrian Airlines AG.

faq.question: Where is Austrian Airlines headquartered?
faq.answer: Austrian Airlines is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.

faq.question: What classes of service does Austrian Airlines offer?
faq.answer: Austrian Airlines offers Economy Class, Business Class, and Premium Economy.
